title: Giorgi Parpalia
text:
Giorgi Parpalia (born 21 June 1986) is a retired <a href="Georgia%20%28country%29">Georgian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>. He played for <a href="FC%20Zorya%20Luhansk">Zorya Luhansk 2</a>, <a href="FC%20Desna%20Chernihiv">Desna Chernihiv</a> and <a href="FC%20Kolkheti%20Khobi">Kolkheti Khobi</a>.
Club career.
Parpalia, started his career in <a href="FC%20Zorya%20Luhansk">Zorya Luhansk 2</a>. In 2008 he moved to <a href="FC%20Desna%20Chernihiv">Desna Chernihiv</a> in <a href="Ukrainian%20First%20League">Ukrainian First League</a> and in the season <a href="2008%E2%80%9309%20Ukrainian%20First%20League">2008–09</a>, he got 7 place with the team and where he played in the match against <a href="FC%20Obolon%20Kyiv">Obolon Kyiv</a>, replacing <a href="Oleksandr%20Hrebieniuk">Oleksandr Hrebieniuk</a> in the second half. In 2011 he moved to <a href="FC%20Kolkheti%20Khobi">Kolkheti Khobi</a> a team in <a href="Georgia%20%28country%29">Georgia</a>. Here he played 25 caps and he scored 3 goals. 5 December 2012, he played also in the match against <a href="FC%20Tskhinvali">Tskhinvali</a> where lost 2–1.
